column5: Get the ultimate lake experience when you escape to Texas at this Burnet 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom vacation rental. Boasting 3,000 square feet, this lakeside house has more than enough room to comfortably accommodate 8 guests. For just a small fee, a brand new 20 foot pontoon boat is available for your use that will allow you to get the most out of your lake getaway. Whether you want to go boating, fishing, swimming, hiking, wine tasting, shopping or try new restaurants, this house gives you the ability to do it all!
column8: New! 3 BR Lakefront Burnet House w/ Pontoon Boat!
